嗯，用户搜索了“范玮琪方发声明辟谣”，我需要整理相关事件的核心事实并呈现多方观点。从搜索结果看，焦点是2025年10月演唱会引发的“骨灰项链”争议及后续法律行动。

先梳理时间线：10月26日盐城演唱会上，范玮琪唱《可不可以不勇敢》后向天飞吻致敬大S，佩戴的黑色心形项链被部分媒体指认为“大S骨灰项链”。28日经纪公司委托北京律所发声明，强调三点：报道完全失实、项链与遗骨无关、将追责造谣者。声明提到不实信息浏览超亿次，已突破社会公序良俗底线。

关键证据链来自品牌核实：时尚博主对比证实范玮琪项链是Acne Studios商业款（约4700元），客服明确“物理不可拆卸”；而小S金钟奖佩戴的骨灰项链是细链小爱心款，两者设计无关。目前仅小S公开承认持有骨灰项链，“具俊晔制作7条分赠姐妹”说法无当事人证实。

舆论反应呈现两极：支持方认为舞台致敬是真情流露，质疑方关联范玮琪过往争议（如2023年丈夫性骚扰风波、2025年3月演唱会被批消费逝者）。文化差异成焦点：骨灰饰品在西方属常见纪念（称Cremation Jewelry），但东亚传统强调“入土为安”。

值得注意的进展：造谣媒体三湘都市报已删文致歉，律师声明援引《民法典》第1024条等条款，强调中央网信办“清朗行动”整治背景。部分网友呼吁尊重逝者尊严，避免情感缅怀沦为流量狩猎场。

最后检查风险提示：声明未提项链具体来源，部分网友对范玮琪情感动机的质疑未完全消散，需保持中立表述。事件本质折射出名人悼念行为在社交媒体时代的隐私困境。


以下是关于“范玮琪方发声明辟谣”事件的综合整理，结合多方信息及关键事实：
### 一、**事件核心：辟谣声明内容**
1. **声明主体与时间**
2025年10月28日，范玮琪经纪公司（香港山河樂文化）委托北京载实律师事务所发布正式声明，针对网络传播的“范玮琪演唱会佩戴大S骨灰项链”一事进行辟谣。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 3, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 7, 16, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "星视频", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226828887493654", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "山河乐文化", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226823141299782", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "娱乐小浪花er", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226823827063872", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "李屋屋啊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226835766149914", "index": 16, "label": ""}, {"name": "财经网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226835984255947", "index": 29, "label": ""}], "name": "星视频", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/0070ni15ly8hcmk65avs5j30go0godgt.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=A4Vi1IQ4T5", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226828887493654", "vType": 3}}```

2. **声明核心内容**
- **事实澄清**：明确否认范玮琪佩戴的项链与大S遗骨有关，强调“骨灰项链”情节纯属虚构，无任何事实依据。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 16, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上游新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226844458583680", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "星视频", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226828887493654", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "李屋屋啊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226835766149914", "index": 16, "label": ""}], "name": "上游新闻", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.30.33.954.954.50/001y6PXDly8h8vgd0d8kgj60rr0rrdh002.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=FRQ8LqiH2S", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226844458583680", "vType": 3}}```
- **责任追究**：指出部分媒体（如三湘都市报）未经核实发布虚假报道，浏览量超亿次，严重侵害范玮琪名誉权，要求立即删除侵权信息并赔偿损失。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [1, 7, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "桂林晚报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226660502964687", "index": 21, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "星视频", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226828887493654", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "娱乐小浪花er", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226823827063872", "index": 7, "label": ""}], "name": "桂林晚报", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/84303eafly8h8v0h3wcvhj20sg0shab8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=DOGW3z6aKn", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226660502964687", "vType": 3}}```
- **社会批判**：批评造谣行为“借逝者话题牟取带血流量”，突破社会公序良俗底线，违反中央网信办“清朗行动”整治网络谣言的要求。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [7, 25, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "娱乐小浪花er", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226823827063872", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "泡泡糖葫芦串", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226855393395924", "index": 25, "label": ""}, {"name": "着陸于", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226854468552025", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```

### 二、**争议起源与事实澄清**
1. **事件源头**
- 2025年10月26日，范玮琪在江苏盐城演唱会演唱歌曲《可不可以不勇敢》后向天空飞吻，致敬已故好友大S。其佩戴的黑色心形项链被部分媒体误传为“大S骨灰项链”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [3, 18, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "剧视大好", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226858098463952", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "上游新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226844458583680", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "桂林晚报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226660502964687", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "剧视大好", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.800.800.50/006IRoSOly8h9kl9jh4o0j30m80m8t9m.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=HD%2BMWbAELp", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226858098463952", "vType": 0}}```
- 网传“具俊晔制作7条骨灰项链分赠姐妹团（含范玮琪）”的说法发酵，引发热议。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [4], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "VousEtoiles", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226624896991310", "index": 4, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **关键辟谣证据**
- **品牌比对**：时尚博主及网友对比证实，范玮琪佩戴的项链为瑞典品牌 **Acne Studios** 的复古心形吊坠（售价约4700元），其设计为“不可拆卸心形扣”，物理上无法装入骨灰。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [4, 21, 41], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "热宝女", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226714989069794", "index": 41, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "VousEtoiles", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226624896991310", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "桂林晚报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226660502964687", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "热宝女", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/9b944873ly8gevgdi5ks1j20u00u0di2.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=rK3jk6%2BI4m", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226714989069794", "vType": 0}}```
- **客服确认**：品牌客服明确表示该款式“拆卸后圈口会变形，无法再次使用”，与小S金钟奖佩戴的细链小爱心骨灰项链设计明显不同。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [4, 41], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "VousEtoiles", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226624896991310", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "热宝女", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226714989069794", "index": 41, "label": ""}]}}```
- **当事人未承认**：范玮琪全程未提及项链的特殊意义，仅通过歌曲和动作表达哀思。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "萌萌哒红色小象", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226857064564883", "index": 17, "label": ""}]}}```

### 三、**舆论反应与争议焦点**
1. **支持方观点**
- 认为范玮琪的舞台致敬是真情流露，歌曲《可不可以不勇敢》因收录大小S和声版本，被视为三人友情的象征。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [15, 17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "2的很有范儿-", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226855468631685", "index": 15, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "萌萌哒红色小象", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226857064564883", "index": 17, "label": ""}], "name": "2的很有范儿-", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/7101ba91ly8haajwyxf14j20u00u0ac7.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=1sMyACwG4U", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226855468631685", "vType": 0}}```
- 部分网友呼吁停止对逝者的消费，尊重范玮琪的悼念行为。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [20, 24, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小袁读书", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226860621335884", "index": 30, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "洛洛洛费", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226862311114270", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "清纯佳人白莲花", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226855638242754", "index": 24, "label": ""}], "name": "小袁读书", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.996.996.50/006mYNy8ly8gkmcr8xsf7j30ro0rot9h.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=iqeQPl4rpv", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226860621335884", "vType": 0}}```

2. **质疑方争议**
- **关联过往事件**：部分舆论结合范玮琪过往争议（如2023年丈夫陈建州性骚扰风波、2025年3月演唱会播放大S合影被批“消费逝者”），质疑其借机制作话题。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "桃雾Camellia", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226861147982159", "index": 19, "label": "大v"}], "name": "桃雾Camellia", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/0089GrvQly8i6s37zw6t7j30u00u0god.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=zIuue60cWQ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226861147982159", "vType": 0}}```
- **伦理争议**：对“骨灰分装”行为存在文化差异讨论——西方常见“骨灰饰品”（Cremation Jewelry），但东亚文化更强调“入土为安”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "卷尾薄荷_Tailmint", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226864167880893", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```

### 四、**事件进展与影响**
1. **媒体纠错**
造谣源头媒体“三湘都市报”于10月28日删除不实报道并公开道歉，承认“事实核查存在疏漏”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [16, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "李屋屋啊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226835766149914", "index": 16, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "桂林晚报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226660502964687", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "李屋屋啊", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/008gK5mKly8gt46s4iacjj30e80e8t9f.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761675807&ssig=f%2FPx%2B5u8%2Fr", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226835766149914", "vType": 0}}```

2. **法律行动**
律师事务所声明援引《民法典》第1024条、第1194条等条款，强调将追究造谣者的法律责任，目前正进行区块链存证和侵权主体溯源。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [7, 26, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "娱乐小浪花er", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226823827063872", "index": 7, "label": ""}, {"name": "着陸于", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226854468552025", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "秀温绪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226857119351237", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```
### 五、**事件本质与反思**
- **过度解读名人悼念行为**：公众对范玮琪舞台动作的误读，反映出社交媒体时代名人隐私与情感表达的困境。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [25, 35, 37], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "泡泡糖葫芦串", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226855393395924", "index": 25, "label": ""}, {"name": "举个栗子扒", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226856174324188", "index": 35, "label": ""}, {"name": "泡芙不吃糖OVO", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226855767481766", "index": 37, "label": ""}]}}```
- **网络信息核实机制缺失**：部分媒体为追逐流量放弃职业规范，凸显“清朗行动”整治虚假信息的必要性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 32, "data": {"num": [22, 26, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "卷尾薄荷_Tailmint", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226864167880893", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "着陸于", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226854468552025", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "无敌八喜-", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226859513776528", "index": 34, "label": ""}]}}```
- **逝者尊严的公共议题**：在尊重逝者（大S于2025年2月因流感并发症离世）的前提下，公众需以事实为依据，避免让缅怀沦为流量狩猎场。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [22, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "卷尾薄荷_Tailmint", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226864167880893", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "Azure梧桐岸", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226853654856000", "index": 27, "label": ""}]}}```
